titleStmt.title: The Church of England's doctrine of non-resistance, justified and vindicated as truly rational and Christian; and the damnable nature of rebellious resistance represented. By Lewes Sharp, rector of Morton Hampstead, in Devon.
titleStmt.author: Sharpe, Lewes.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, and are to be sold by Randal Taylor, near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
